entry.name: shutdown
entry.description: Shutting down the MUD couldn't be easier!

entry.name: mem
entry.description: Mud getting slow? Object disappearing? Want to know whats going on underneath? The mem command helps you do all this.
entry.syntax: mem [-a] [-os] [-r] [-cls] [-m] [-t] [-gc] [-o [object name]] where: \t-a\tshow everything \t-os\tshow OS and architecture info \t-r\tshow runtime info \t-cls\t class loader information \t-m\t memory information \t-t\t show thread information \t-gc\t show garbage collection data \t-o [object]\t show objects in registry, with optional name parameter
